name: part_008
file: tmp_【#尾丸ポルカ生誕祭】ポルカプロデュース!最強アイドルグループ3DLIVE! [ywvR52V7HiI]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Ez Do Dance' with Omaru Polka at the DJ booth and Tokoyami Towa dancing on stage.
MC section where Polka announces the end of the DJ set and introduces Flare's solo performance.
Performance of the song 'Onegai Darling' by Shiranui Flare, with Omaru Polka cheering from a PIP window.

subtitles.original: I've got a feeling 抜け出していく 街が目覚めるころ
subtitles.english: I've got a feeling, as I break away just as the city wakes up.

subtitles.original: 朝焼けに口づけてる 波も抱きしめている
subtitles.english: Kissing the morning glow, embracing the waves as well.

subtitles.original: Ez Do Dance Ez Do Dance 踊る君を見てる
subtitles.english: Ez Do Dance, Ez Do Dance, I'm watching you dance.

subtitles.original: Ez Do Dance Ez Do Dance 君だけを見ている
subtitles.english: Ez Do Dance, Ez Do Dance, I'm looking only at you.

subtitles.original: Ez Do Dance Ez Do Dance 踊る君を見てる
subtitles.english: Ez Do Dance, Ez Do Dance, I'm watching you dance.

subtitles.original: Ez Do Dance Ez Do Dance 君だけを見ている
subtitles.english: Ez Do Dance, Ez Do Dance, I'm looking only at you.

subtitles.original: 欲しいものはいつだって 不意に遭遇する
subtitles.english: The things I want, I always encounter them unexpectedly.

subtitles.original: 見えない明日 突然に 巡り合えるときめき
subtitles.english: The invisible tomorrow, the excitement of a sudden encounter.

subtitles.original: 午前5時 永遠の ルール変わる瞬間
subtitles.english: 5 AM, the moment the eternal rules change.

subtitles.original: きっと愛なんて 呼べるものじゃないけど
subtitles.english: It's surely not something you could call love, but...

subtitles.original: I've got a feeling 抜け出していく 街が目覚めるころ
subtitles.english: I've got a feeling, as I break away just as the city wakes up.

subtitles.original: 朝焼けに口づけてる 波も抱きしめている
subtitles.english: Kissing the morning glow, embracing the waves as well.

subtitles.original: Ez Do Dance Ez Do Dance 踊る君を見てる
subtitles.english: Ez Do Dance, Ez Do Dance, I'm watching you dance.

subtitles.original: Ez Do Dance Ez Do Dance 君だけを見ている
subtitles.english: Ez Do Dance, Ez Do Dance, I'm looking only at you.

subtitles.original: Ez Do Dance Ez Do Dance 踊る君を見てる
subtitles.english: Ez Do Dance, Ez Do Dance, I'm watching you dance.

subtitles.original: Ez Do Dance Ez Do Dance 君だけを見ている
subtitles.english: Ez Do Dance, Ez Do Dance, I'm looking only at you.

subtitles.original: 3, 2, 1, Better!
subtitles.english: 3, 2, 1, Better!

subtitles.original: Yo! Yeah! Yeah! Oh! Come on!
subtitles.english: Yo! Yeah! Yeah! Oh! Come on!

subtitles.original: I like that, I guess, Keep up the beat like it
subtitles.english: I like that, I guess, keep up the beat like it.

subtitles.original: Jack Black, all the night, so happy, so yeah!
subtitles.english: Jack Black, all the night, so happy, so yeah!

subtitles.original: Get moving, my joiners, shake your body, shake everybody
subtitles.english: Get moving, my joiners, shake your body, shake everybody.

subtitles.original: 体の芯まで感じる瞬間 時間の壁まで弾けるリズム
subtitles.english: The moment you feel it to your core, a rhythm that bursts through the wall of time.

subtitles.original: I've got a feeling 抜け出していく 街が目覚めるころ
subtitles.english: I've got a feeling, as I break away just as the city wakes up.

subtitles.original: 朝焼けに口づけてる 波も抱きしめている
subtitles.english: Kissing the morning glow, embracing the waves as well.

subtitles.original: Ez Do Dance Ez Do Dance 踊る君を見てる
subtitles.english: Ez Do Dance, Ez Do Dance, I'm watching you dance.

subtitles.original: Ez Do Dance Ez Do Dance 君だけを見ている
subtitles.english: Ez Do Dance, Ez Do Dance, I'm looking only at you.

subtitles.original: Ez Do Dance Ez Do Dance 踊る君を見てる
subtitles.english: Ez Do Dance, Ez Do Dance, I'm watching you dance.

subtitles.original: Ez Do Dance Ez Do Dance 君だけを見ている
subtitles.english: Ez Do Dance, Ez Do Dance, I'm looking only at you.

subtitles.original: I've got a feeling 抜け出していく 街が目覚めるころ
subtitles.english: I've got a feeling, as I break away just as the city wakes up.

subtitles.original: 朝焼けに口づけてる... Thank you Towa-sama! Yeah!
subtitles.english: Kissing the morning glow... Thank you, Towa-sama! Yeah!

subtitles.original: さあ、そしてDJタイムが終わりまーした！
subtitles.english: Now then, the DJ time has come to an end!

subtitles.original: 次は誰かな？おっ、フレア！じゃあポルカは客席側に移るわ！
subtitles.english: Who's next? Oh, Flare! Then Polka will move over to the audience side!

subtitles.original: 後で、ちょっと3人曲あるから、その時はまたよろしくー！
subtitles.english: Later on, there's a song for the three of us, so I'll see you then!

subtitles.original: おねだりしてみてほしいの
subtitles.english: I want you to try begging me.

subtitles.original: おねだりフレアちゃーん！
subtitles.english: Onegai Flare-chan!

subtitles.original: ダーリン あなたは私の言うこと全然聞かない
subtitles.english: Darling, you don't listen to anything I say at all.

subtitles.original: あれほどやめてと言ったタバコもお酒も 毎日二箱七回一日たりとも欠かさず
subtitles.english: The cigarettes and alcohol I told you so much to quit, two packs and seven drinks every single day without fail.

subtitles.original: 肝臓やられてお釈迦になっても 看病してあげないんだから
subtitles.english: Even if your liver gives out and you kick the bucket, I'm not going to nurse you.

subtitles.original: あーやこーや言うこと聞かない あなたのハートは真っ黒です
subtitles.english: Your heart that won't listen to this or that is pitch black.

subtitles.original: 言いたいことは言わないし
subtitles.english: You don't say what you want to say.

subtitles.original: 行きたいとこからやりたいことまで決めてるくせにたまりま専務
subtitles.english: Even though you've decided everything from where you want to go to what you want to do, I can't stand it.

subtitles.original: ねえ そんなの馬鹿みたいじゃない そうじゃない じゃない じゃない
subtitles.english: Hey, isn't that just stupid? That's not it, not it, not it.

subtitles.original: 言いたいことがあるならパッと言えば？
subtitles.english: If you have something to say, why don't you just say it?

subtitles.original: いつも思わせぶりな感じで 察してほしい感じで
subtitles.english: Always acting suggestive, acting like you want me to guess.

subtitles.original: わざと口にしないのずるくない？ 馬鹿じゃないの？
subtitles.english: Isn't it unfair that you purposely don't say it? Are you stupid?

subtitles.original: お願いダーリン 見て聞いて 欲しいのは形のないもの
subtitles.english: Please, darling, look and listen. What I want is something without a form.

subtitles.original: 馬鹿にしないで 見て聞いて 覗いてよ瞳の奥の方
subtitles.english: Don't make fun of me, look and listen. Take a peek into the depths of my eyes.

subtitles.original: まっすぐ見つめて おねだりしてみてほしいの
subtitles.english: Look straight at me. I want you to try begging me.

subtitles.original: ダーリン 私はあなたの気持ちを全然知らないわ
subtitles.english: Darling, I don't know your feelings at all.

subtitles.original: あれほど熱心に見つめてきたのに今ではすっかり知らんぷり
subtitles.english: Even though you looked at me so intently, now you're completely playing dumb.

subtitles.original: ていうかそれって胡座をかいてるだけなんじゃないですか？
subtitles.english: I mean, aren't you just resting on your laurels?

subtitles.original: ぶっちゃけ下先三寸あなたのせいで私のハートはボロボロです
subtitles.english: To be honest, because of your glib tongue, my heart is in tatters.

subtitles.original: つれない時はつれないし
subtitles.english: When you're cold, you're cold.

subtitles.original: そっちがなかなか言い出さないからいつも私が舵取り専門
subtitles.english: Since you won't speak up, I'm always the one taking the lead.

subtitles.original: ねえ なんだか馬鹿みたいじゃない そうじゃない じゃない じゃない
subtitles.english: Hey, doesn't it feel a bit stupid? That's not it, not it, not it.

subtitles.original: こんなことさせてちゃダメ出し
subtitles.english: I can't let you keep doing this.

subtitles.original: どこか足元見てる感じで 値踏みされてる感じで
subtitles.english: Feeling like you're taking advantage of me, like you're appraising me.

subtitles.original: 駆け引きやら勝ち負けじゃなくない？
subtitles.english: Isn't it not about tactics or winning and losing?

subtitles.original: そういう面倒くさいことしてるから面倒くさい
subtitles.english: It's annoying because you're doing such annoying things.
